time.description: Maximum (wall-)runtime for the job in HH:MM:SS format

cpus.description: Number of CPUs required for the job

memory.description: Maximum amount of RAM consumed by the job

blacklist.description: Comma-separated black-list of nodes not to use (default: all nodes allowed)

queue.description: Which queue to use (default: default queue)

conda_env.description: Activate the given conda environment for the job

skipValidation.description: Skip conda environment activation (faster submission but will lead to failed jobs if the environment isn't valid)

report.description: Report success or failure of the job at the end of the log file
